name: Track and Field Legends Online Trivia | Track & Field | 10 Questions

questions.text: How fast did Roger Bannister run when he went under four minutes for the first time in the mile?
questions.explanation:
3:59.4

	The first person to run exactly 4 minutes for the mile was Derek Ibbotson

questions.text: Tommy Smith and which other runner launched a black power salute when winning gold and silver in the 200m in Mexico '68?
questions.explanation:
John Carlos.

	Carlos led off the bend only to be blown away by Smith's 'Tommy Jets'

questions.text: What was the world indoor record for 200m when it was set by Frankie Fredericks?
questions.explanation:
19.92

	Frankie Frederiks, Namibia's most famous citizen.

questions.text: Who broke Lee Evans' 400m world record which had stood for over 20 years?
Dick Fosbury revolutionised the world of high jumping but how high did he jump when winning his Olympic title?
Mike Powell broke Bob Beamon's long jump record in 1991, but how far did Carl Lewis jump to take silver in the competition?
questions.explanation:
8.91m

	Greatest athlete of the last millennium.

questions.text: Renaldo Nehemiah was the greatest sprint hurdler of his generation but what was his nick name?
What was the name of the British 100m champion in the 1924 Olympics in Paris as immortalised in the film Chariots of Fire?
Who ended Ed Moses' record unbeaten run over the 400m hurdles?
What is Jonathan Edwards longest jump of all time, not necessarily legal?
